subject: Simsonn Pedals
description_text:
Hi, 
I am having issues with shipping information, I ordered through amazon and got SF # through the amazon app, however, amazon app says that a delivery was attempted today, but the package is not even in the right state. I called SFExpress and they said that the SF# was incorrect and that I needed to reach out to you guys to get my correct shipping number. Any help would be appreciated, thank you. 

Sincerely,
Spencer

conversations.body_text: Hi Spencer 777,  Could you please provide us with your order number? We will check it for you.

Order #
111-8922373-4165826 from Amazon

Tracking ID: SF6047227116158



On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 21:51, service@simsonn.com

Hi Spencer 777,  I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. As per your case, we found your situation before, so we have reshipped a new package to you from our US warehouse. Here is your new tracking number: 887920088053,   the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack
